statement.p:
Consider the differential equation \dfrac{dP}{dt} = (P-{{unstable}})({{stable}}-P).
Draw a slope field. (You can use technology to help.)
Find any equilibrium solutions and decide whether they are stable or unstable.

answer.p: The equilibrium solution P(t) = {{stable}} is stable. The equilibrium solution P(t) = {{unstable}} is unstable.
